name: Neon GraVel
description:
In this neontastic game you will encounter many unique levels. In each level you will have to make your way with gravity-affecting blocks (Placeables).
But be careful, each block will reduce your highscore! Therefore try to use as few blocks as possible.
After your path to the goal is built, you still have to traverse it! Use skillful jumps and your placed blocks to reach the goal. Solve many unique riddles, visit many different levels and optimize your highscore.
